name: Chronotherium
description:
Chronotherium is my submission for the 7DRL 2020 game jam, and my first successful 7DRL!

The Game

In Chronotherium you are Time Wizard, trapped for eternity in an ever-shifting interdimensional palace, whose halls are stalked by the mythical beast Chronotherium. To gain back control of your own time and escape this prison, you must slay the beast and recover the ancient Golden Hourglass.

The game features 5 experience levels, each with a new spell to bend spacetime to your will!

NOTE: This was completed during a full week of work so there is a level of polish missing from the game. Expect bugs!

Controls
  • MOVEMENT - Keypad or Vim Keys
  • STAIRS - <, >
  • SPELLS :
    • Freeze - f
    • Teleport - t
    • Push - p
    • Rewind - r
    • Event Horizon - e
  • DOOR - o (to manually open/close)
  • PICKUP - , (comma) or g
  • QUIT - q
  • CONFIRM - Space / Enter
Credits

Colors are from the excellent Solarized color scheme
Made in Python 3.6 using bearlibterminal and clubsandwich
Source code for Chronotherium can be found here --> https://github.com/wurthers/chronotherium
